results.text: {LOCALE} is being destabilized by outside agitators.
{LOCALE} is being eaten away by traitors within!
The government of {LOCALE} is subverting the will of the people.
results.rumor: the government is not to be trusted

results.text: The common people are easily swayed; talk of justice and restitution has led to growing division and resentment.
Everybody knows that the ruling class is full of Idealists; they see us regular humans as sheep to be controlled.
They say mutants are just like us, but how much do we really know about them?
results.rumor: mutants are planning to take over the world

results.text: Their goal is to control the economy, since if you have the money you can do anything.
results.rumor: the banks are controlled by mysterious figures

results.text: They exist to sow chaos and reap the rewards. Our suffering and strife is just a game to them.
results.rumor: the chaos in the world is no accident

results.text: They want power for its own sake.
results.rumor: the banks are controlled by mysterious figures

results.text: It's vital that we identify the threat and stop them now, while we're still able to act.
It's time to make sure that the rulers are more scared of the people than the people are of their rulers.
